roleset.name: make unhappy

example.name: dissatisfy with
example.text: If parents are dissatisfied [*-1] with a school, they should have the option of switching to another.

example.name: dissatisfy by
example.text: His grip on power unraveled this summer as thousands of his countrymen, dissatisfied [*] by the harshness of his rule, fled to the West.
